itunes:title: Episode 602 - DB Sports Companion Show 05/19/20 - "The Last Dance" Recap
title: Episode 602 - DB Sports Companion Show 05/19/20 - "The Last Dance" Recap
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest John Brenkus to discuss anything and everything involving the Chicago Bulls’ documentary “The Last Dance”, how some players from the Bulls believed they were portrayed unrealistically in the ESPN docu...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest John Brenkus to discuss anything and everything involving the Chicago Bulls’ documentary “The Last Dance”, how some players from the Bulls believed they were portrayed unrealistically in the ESPN documentary, the three debate whether or not there has ever been a greater basketball player than Michael Jordan, and talk about how Mike Tyson’s life blood was intimidation and when he lost it, he lost matches.

Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest John Brenkus to discuss anything and everything involving the Chicago Bulls’ documentary “The Last Dance”, how some players from the Bulls believed they were portrayed unrealistically in the ESPN documentary, the three debate whether or not there has ever been a greater basketball player than Michael Jordan, and talk about how Mike Tyson’s life blood was intimidation and when he lost it, he lost matches.
